resources.string: Background guidance while a route is active.
Drivest is guiding your current route in background.
Drivest is running your practice route in background.
Enable notifications to keep background navigation status visible.
Annual tier unlocks daily training plans
Generate and rehearse practical test routes around your selected centre.
Plan and run point-to-point guidance with full navigation UI.
To continue, you need to accept the Terms and Privacy Policy.
You must confirm you are 16 or older to continue.
Allow analytics to help improve app quality and routing guidance. This is optional.
Enable notifications for updates and reminders. You can change this later in Settings.
Drivest needs location access while using the app to start route guidance.
Location permission is required to start route features.

Drivest guidance is advisory only and may be incomplete or delayed. Do not rely on this app as a guarantee. Do not interact with the app while driving. Keep full control of the vehicle and always follow live road signs, road markings, and traffic laws.
Have you passed your practical test?
Update your driver mode to keep guidance matched to your stage.
Search for where you want to drive and preview the route before starting.
Type at least 2 characters to search.
No destinations found for that query.
Set your public Mapbox token to search destinations.
Search by centre name or town and select where you want to practice.
No test centres match that search.
Offline pack downloaded for this centre.
Route pack downloaded. Hazard pack could not be downloaded.
Could not download offline pack right now.
No routes available to cache for this centre.
Could not load centres from local data.
No practice routes available for this centre yet.
Fine-tune your drive for confidence, calm, and control.
Learner mode prioritises extra guidance and practice-focused setup.
New Driver mode keeps hazards on and enables a steadier low-stress driving setup.
Standard mode reduces prompt intensity for confident day-to-day driving.
Play a short alert sound when the threshold is reached.
Notifications are disabled in system settings.
Preference is on, but system permission is currently denied.
Data advisory: your stored pack may be older than 90 days. Refresh before relying on it.
Changes are saved automatically and apply immediately.
Analytics are optional and help improve routing quality. You can turn this off anytime.
Enable analytics in onboarding to allow analytics.
System notification permission is currently denied. Open system settings to enable notifications for Drivest.
No email app available on this device.
No browser app available on this device.
No drive log found yet. Complete and stop a drive session first.
No drive summary yet. Exported a developer diagnostic log instead.

Drivest content is advisory only and may be incomplete or outdated. Route overlays, hazard cues, and speed guidance are informational and must not be treated as guaranteed. Always follow live signs, markings, and legal requirements. The Highway Code remains the authoritative source for UK road rules and safe driving behavior.
Service availability is not guaranteed. Features can change over time, and temporary interruptions are possible.
Use these options to request a copy of your data or request deletion of your data records.
Stress level adjusted. New route selected.
Preview ready. Tap Start Guidance to begin.
Could not preview route. Check token/network.
You missed the start point. Rerouting to route start.
Reached start point. Starting selected test route.
Waiting for current GPS location. Please move outside for a better signal.
Could not create a route to the test centre start point.
At the mini roundabout, take the correct exit.
Bus lane ahead. No entry at this time.
Bus lane ahead. Open to all traffic.

Subscriptions renew automatically unless cancelled through your app store account settings.
You can cancel anytime in your App Store or Google Play subscription settings.
Refunds are handled by the app store.

Drivest guidance is advisory only and does not replace road signs, legal duties, or instructor/examiner instructions. Keep full control of the vehicle and follow live road conditions. Version: %1$s
Offline-first lessons, quizzes, and route-linked revision.
Complete quizzes to reveal weakest topics.
Theory content is unavailable right now.
No questions available for this mode yet.
Drivest Theory is revision support. It is not affiliated with DVSA. Content is advisory and must not replace road signs, legal duties, or professional instruction.
Some sign descriptions and public guidance references are derived from UK open guidance sources where permitted. Drivest provides original summaries and explanations for revision support.

Based on UK DfT \"Know your traffic signs\" reference assets and image index data. Use as revision support and follow live road signs and legal requirements.
